resources.string: Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza lufinyelele isiphathi sokulandiwe namafayela alandiwe. Izinhlelo zokusebenza ezinobungozi zingakusebenzisa lokhu ukuphazamisa ukulanda ziphinde zifinyelele emininingwaneni eyimfihlo.

"Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza lufinyelele izinto ezijulile zesiphathi sokulayisha. Izinhlelo zokusebenza ezinobungozi zingakusebenzisa lokhu ukuphazamisa ukulanda ziphinde zifinyelele emininingwaneni eyimfihlo."
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi ithumele izaziso yelana nokulayishwa okuqediwe. Izuhlelo lokusebenza ezinobungozi zingakusebenzisa lokhu ukudida ezinye izinsiz ezilayisha amafayel.
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi ibone konke okulandiwe ekhadini le-SD ngale kokubona ukuthi iluphi uhlelo lokusebenza elulandile.
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukulanda amafayela okulondoloza kwesikhashana angakwazi ukususwa ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho imeneja yokulanda idinga esikhala esengeziwe.
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukulanda amafayela ngomeneja wokulanda ngaphandle kokuba isaziso siboniswe umsebenzisi.
Vumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi libone liphinde liguqule konke okulandiwe okuqalwe uhlelo lwesistimu.

"Kufanele usebenzise i-Wi-Fi ukuqedela lokhu %s kulayisha.
Thinta Touch %s ukuqlisa lokhu kulayisha esikhathini esizayo uxhuaniseke enethiwekhini ye-Wi-Fi."

"Ukuqala lokhu kulanda %s manje kungenza impilo yebhethri yakho ibe mfishane noma kungadla ukusetshenziswa okweqile kwedatha yakho yokuxhumana okuholela ekukhokhisweni inkampani yakho yenethiwekhi kuncike esivumelwaneni senu sedatha.
Thinta %s ukuqala lokhu kulayisha esikhathini esizayo uxhumaniseke enethiwekhini ye-Wi-Fi."
